title: Stuffed Zucchini from Knorr®
directions: Scoop out pulp of zucchini and chop. Heat oil in medium saucepan over medium heat and cook zucchini pulp, stirring occasionally, until tender, about 2 minutes. Stir in water and Knorr Fiesta Sides™ - Mexican Rice. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 7 minutes or until rice is tender.
Arrange zucchini on baking sheet. Evenly fill with rice mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 25 minutes or until zucchini are tender.
ingredients: 1 (5.4 ounce) package Knorr Fiesta Sides™ - Mexican Rice
